name: Dice-Rolling-Expt
description: Parcel implementation of dice rolling experiment

scripts.build: rm dist/index.* && parcel build --public-url ./ src/index.html && rm otree_app/dice_rolling/static/dice_rolling/index.* && cp dist/index.* otree_app/dice_rolling/static/dice_rolling && ln -s ~/dicerolling/otree_app/dice_rolling/static/dice_rolling/index.*.js index.js && mv index.js otree_app/dice_rolling/static/dice_rolling
